content: Phase 1A: Console Statement Cleanup - Remove/replace 768+ production console statements across 360 files with proper logging
Phase 1B: Security Vulnerability Patches - Fix 6 moderate severity vulnerabilities (esbuild, prismjs)
Phase 1C: Bundle Size Optimization - Reduce from 481KB to <300KB via code splitting and tree shaking
Phase 2A: ErrorBoundary Consolidation - Replace 4 implementations with single UnifiedErrorBoundary
